citations.narrative:
There are several tires, tarps and discarded items along the end and front side of the rabbit barn . Items such as these
create a breeding ground for pest that could harm the animals . Animal housing areas must be kept free of trash to
facilitate husbandry practices. Premises shall remain free of accumulations of trash .
CORRECT BY : 3/21/2024

citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
The facility is unaware that birds are now regulated and does not have a plan for environmental enhancement for the
exhibited poultry and peacocks. Dealers, exhibitors, and research facilities must develop, document, and follow a species-
appropriate plan for environment enhancement adequate to promote the psychological well-being of birds. The plan must
be approved by the attending veterinarian and must be in accordance with the regulations in this subpart and with
currently accepted professional standards .
CORRECT BY : 4/14/2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.56(c) 
   
Sanitation. 
There are several tires, tarps and discarded items along the end and front side of the rabbit barn . Items such as these 
create a breeding ground for pest that could harm the animals . Animal housing areas must be kept free of trash to 
facilitate husbandry practices. Premises shall remain free of accumulations of trash .  
CORRECT BY : 3/21/2024 
3.154 
   
Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being. 
The facility is unaware that birds are now regulated and does not have a plan for environmental enhancement for the 
exhibited poultry and peacocks. Dealers, exhibitors, and research facilities must develop, document, and follow a species-
appropriate plan for environment enhancement adequate to promote the psychological well-being of birds. The plan must 
be approved by the attending veterinarian and must be in accordance with the regulations in this subpart and with 
currently accepted professional standards . 
CORRECT BY : 4/14/2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
